shapes.label: A shape definition for a resource (e.g. instance, schema) in Nexus
shapes.comment: A Nexus resource may have a corresponding type (e.g. nxv:Schema for a schema and nxv:Instance for an instance) and/or may have specific properties (e.g. nxv:rev, nxv:deprecated).

shapes.name: Revision number
shapes.description: The revision number of a resource.

shapes.name: Deprecated
shapes.description: A boolean tag indicating whether the resource is deprecated or not.

property.name: self
property.description: The shape of this specific resource representation identifier.
